titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3986) to provide for a study of the engineering feasibility of a water exchange in lieu of electrification of the Chandler Pumping Plant at Prosser Diversion Dam, Washington.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-866, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3986 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. The amendment recommended by the Committee on Resources now printed in the bill shal be considered as adopted. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 277.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 581.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/19/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3986 (engineering feasibility study of water exchange at Prosser Diversion Dam, Washington).
